GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.64
GSD.description:
netfilter: flowtable: fix stuck flows on cleanup due to pending work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.64 by commit 8fbdec08dbf7d7ab8e35bdc65eb4394bc82d1e26, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit c29f74e0df7a02b8303bcdce93a7c0132d62577a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: flowtable: fix stuck flows on cleanup due to pending work
